author: stevehay
msg: Remove pages imported from the old website which don't actually get generated from the contents of https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/perl/modperl/docs/trunk. They probably used to but don't any more and old copies just got left behind. I've verified that none of these pages are linked to from any other pages.
Also remove two old scripts which are not mentioned anywhere and which relate to the contents of the old dist/ folder (which was recently moved to http://archive.apache.org/dist/perl).

msg: SLING-2698 - resource access security service for resource providers. Distinguish between context application and provider

author: uschindler
msg: PLEASE RUN "ant precommit" (root) or alternatively the faster "ant check-forbidden-apis" (in your module folder) before committing!
